jsnes

SNES emulator with somewhat easy integration with web browser stuff. mut's plunderludics uses this mainly
(external link)

our plunderludics

  • auto mario
  • tennis for one
  • pacman quine

techniques

  • simulate key/controller input (e.g. trigger a jump)
  • set parameters or trigger events based on game state values (e.g. Mario X position)
  • modify game state values (e.g. num coins)
  • save state
  • load state
